item.title: 铜价升至两年来最高点，多头看到了赤字
item.description: 在全球供应缺口不断扩大的预测推动下，铜价强劲反弹，触及 2022 年以来的最高水平。【原文：Copper touched its highest level since 2022 after a powerful rally fueled by forecasts of a growing global supply deficit.】

item.title: 律师称对冲基金经理菲利普斯不该入狱
item.description: Glen Point Capital 联合创始人尼尔-菲利普斯（Neil Phillips）去年因操纵美元兑南非兰特汇率被判有罪，他的律师在一份法庭文件中称，他不应该在监狱服刑。【原文：Glen Point Capital co-founder Neil Phillips, who was found guilty last year of manipulating the US dollar-South African rand exchange rate, shouldn’t have to serve any time in prison, his lawyers argued in a court filing.】

item.title: 欧元区工资问题令欧洲央行对降息保持谨慎
item.description: 欧元区工人年初的工资增长强劲，但这对欧洲中央银行官员们思考如何降低利率的紧张情绪并无多大帮助。【原文：Robust early-year wage growth for euro-area workers will do little to calm the nerves of European Central Bank officials pondering how much they can lower interest rates.】

item.title: Capital A 的 Teleport 目标是在分拆航空公司后实现快速增长
item.description: Capital A Bhd.首席执行官皮特-查龙旺萨（Pete Chareonwongsak）表示，该集团的物流部门 Teleport 将不会受到该集团即将剥离航空资产的影响，并怀有自己的首次公开募股（IPO）野心。【原文：Capital A Bhd.’s logistics arm Teleport won’t be hampered by the imminent spinoff of the group’s airline assets and harbors its own IPO ambitions, Chief Executive Officer Pete Chareonwongsak said.】

item.title: 中国大型银行启动 83 亿美元减亏债券销售活动
item.description: 中国最大的两家国有银行将从本周起出售总计 600 亿元人民币（83 亿美元）的总损失吸收能力债券，这是中国贷款机构首次出售此类债券，以补充资本并支持世界第二大经济体的增长。【原文：Two of China’s biggest state banks will sell a combined 60 billion yuan ($8.3 billion) of total loss-absorbing capacity bonds starting this week, the first such debt sales by Chinese lenders in a drive to replenish capital and support growth of the world’s No. 2 economy.】

item.title: 欺诈担忧为印度蓬勃发展的小型 IPO 亮起红旗
item.description: 印度证券监管机构本月揭露的一连串会计欺诈案，给小企业股价的暴涨带来了另一个风险。【原文：A string of accounting frauds unearthed by India’s securities regulator this month poses another risk to the blistering rally in shares of tiny businesses.】

item.title: 长江资产将香港房屋价格下调三分之一以促进销售
item.description: 随着市场竞争的白热化，香港开发商长江资产控股有限公司（CK Asset Holdings Ltd. ）已将部分住宅的价格削减了三分之一。【原文：Hong Kong developer CK Asset Holdings Ltd. has slashed prices for some homes by a third, as market competition heats up.】

item.title: 喜达屋财团提出收购要约后，ESR 跃升幅度创 2020 年以来之最
item.description: 在 ESR 集团有限公司收到一个投资者财团提出的非约束性收购建议后，该公司股价攀升至四年多来的最高点，这证实了彭博新闻社早些时候的报道。【原文：ESR Group Ltd. shares climbed the most in more than four years after the firm received a non-binding takeover proposal from a consortium of investors, confirming an earlier Bloomberg News report.】

item.title: 日本首相铃木认为有必要与日本央行保持密切协调
item.description: 日本财务大臣铃木俊一强调了政府与日本央行之间协调与合作的重要性，以确保它们在追求政策目标时不会相互阻碍。【原文：Japanese Minister of Finance Shunichi Suzuki stressed the importance of coordination and collaboration between the government and the Bank of Japan to ensure they don’t hinder each other in pursuing their policy objectives.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称沃尔玛将裁减或迁移数百个公司职位
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，沃尔玛公司正在裁减数百个公司职位，并要求大多数远程员工返回办公室。【原文：Walmart Inc. is axing hundreds of corporate jobs and asking most remote workers to return to offices, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰聘请阿卜杜勒卡里姆负责中东地区的筹资工作
item.description: 根据彭博社获得的一份声明，蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. has hired Haitham Abdulkarim to oversee the company’s institutional business in the Middle East, where he’ll focus on scaling investment and operations teams across Abu Dhabi and Dubai, according to a statement provided to Bloomberg.】

item.title: 计划向 Aozora 投资 3.3 亿美元后大和股价下跌
item.description: 大和证券集团股份有限公司（Daiwa Securities Group Inc.【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc. shares tumbled after the firm said it will take a stake in Aozora Bank Ltd., which just suffered its first loss in 15 years.】

item.title: 日本央行政策押注，日本 20 年期收益率创 2013 年以来新高
item.description: 日本 20 年期国债收益率攀升至 2013 年以来的最高水平，原因是市场猜测日本央行将在常规操作中再次减少购债数量，以应对日元的持续疲软。【原文：Japan’s 20-year government bond yield climbed to its highest level since 2013 on speculation the central bank will reduce debt-buying amounts at its regular operations again in response to sustained yen weakness.】

item.title: 印度债券是亚洲最不受国债波动影响的债券之一
item.description: 尽管国债出现波动，但印度债券的表现仍好于大多数亚洲同行，这增强了印度债务在被纳入全球主要指数之前的吸引力。【原文：Indian bonds are holding up better than most Asian peers despite the swings in Treasuries, boosting the appeal of the nation’s debt before its inclusion into major global indexes.】

item.title: 中国建筑商 Agile 首次因美元债券违约
item.description: 中国别墅公寓和高层住宅开发商雅居乐集团控股有限公司（Agile Group Holdings Ltd.）首次出现公开发行的美元债券违约，凸显了中国前所未有的房地产危机中挥之不去的困境。【原文：Agile Group Holdings Ltd., a Chinese developer of villa apartments and high-rise homes, defaulted for the first time on publicly issued dollar bonds, underscoring lingering distress amid the nation’s unprecedented property crisis.】

item.title: 野村在最新增长计划中力争到 2030 年实现利润翻番
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.）首席执行官奥田健太郎（Kentaro Okuda）发布了到本十年末税前利润几乎翻一番的目标，力图在去年盈利复苏的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc. unveiled a target to almost double pretax profit by the end of the decade, as Chief Executive Officer Kentaro Okuda seeks to build on last year’s earnings revival.】

item.title: 需求疲软导致炼油厂削减柴油产量，柴油市场陷入低迷
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，由于工业和运输燃料供不应求，炼油厂不得不降低运转率，转而集中精力生产汽油和航空燃料，柴油生产的收益率急剧下降。【原文：Returns from making diesel have fallen sharply over the last few months as supply of the industrial and transport fuel has outpaced demand, spurring refiners to cut run rates and focus on producing gasoline and jet fuel instead.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司限制政治性股息支付
item.description: 巴西国有控股石油巨头巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）在因股息问题引发政治风波后，正在限制股东派息。【原文：Brazil’s state-controlled oil giant Petrobras is curbing shareholder payouts after a political blowup over its dividends.】

item.title: 贝莱德看好日本央行政策调整后的日本投资机会
item.description: 贝莱德公司亚太区主管 Susan Chan 说，随着日本货币政策的转变和公司治理改革创造出机会，日本已成为对全球投资者具有吸引力的投资目的地。【原文：Japan has become an attractive destination for global investors as its monetary policy shift and corporate governance reforms create opportunities, BlackRock Inc.’s head of Asia-Pacific Susan Chan said.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。高盛认为美国股市和债券面临上行压力。耶伦希望中国不会对特区实施重大贸易报复。中国加密货币矿工被勒令关闭美国导弹基地附近的土地。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Goldman sees upside pressure for US stocks and bonds. Yellen hopes China won’t mount major trade retaliation against DC. Chinese crypto miner ordered off land near US missile base. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 交易商关注欧佩克报告和通胀数据，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 在欧佩克（OPEC）发布市场展望之前，石油保持上涨，交易商在寻找是否延长供应限制的线索，而美国的通胀数据将影响对货币政策的预期。【原文：Oil held a gain before the release of OPEC’s market outlook, with traders looking for clues on whether supply curbs will be extended, and US inflation data that will shape expectations for monetary policy.】

item.title: 墨西哥航空公司在墨西哥股票退市后寻求在美国上市
item.description: Grupo Aeromexico SAB 正在寻求重返股票市场，在从墨西哥证券交易所退市两年后，该公司申请在美国首次公开发行股票。【原文：Grupo Aeromexico SAB is seeking a return to equity markets, filing for a US initial public offering two years after delisting from the Mexican stock exchange.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹尚未说服全球基金
item.description: 中国股市可能已经触底，但资金经理们不愿大规模回流。【原文：Chinese stocks may have bottomed, but money managers are reluctant to return en masse.】

item.title: AMC 将利用备忘录套现 股票交易者推动股价上涨
item.description: 散户交易商涌入 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.【原文：Retail traders flocking to AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. in hopes of burning short sellers may also be helping the company shore up its finances.】

item.title: CPI 逼近，亚洲股市开盘谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 继华尔街在关键的美国通胀数据公布前表现谨慎之后，亚洲股市开盘相当谨慎，这些数据将有助于确定美联储政策的前景。【原文：Asian stocks were poised for a fairly cautious opening, following a wary session in Wall Street ahead of key US inflation data that will help shape the outlook for Federal Reserve policy.】

item.title: 贝莱德亚太区主管推介私募市场和日本 ETF
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：The private-market boom is set to get a fresh lease on life in the event the Federal Reserve slashes interest rates – refueling the global hunt for yield along the way, according to the Asia-Pacific head of BlackRock Inc.】

item.title: Dreyfus 要求 ICE 交易所在食糖交付延迟后介入
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，路易-德莱福斯公司要求洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange Inc.【原文：Louis Dreyfus Co. asked Intercontinental Exchange Inc. to intervene in a dispute over delays to deliveries of sugar sold through the New York bourse, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大亨贝拉的 Novelis 计划最快于 6 月在美国上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亿万富翁库马尔-曼加拉姆-贝拉（Kumar Mangalam Birla）的印度铝业公司（Hindalco Industries Ltd.）旗下的铝制品制造商 Novelis Inc.【原文：Novelis Inc., the aluminum products maker owned by billionaire Kumar Mangalam Birla’s Hindalco Industries Ltd., is seeking to complete a planned US initial public offering as soon as early June, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国大量废食用油引发提高美国关税的呼声
item.description: 在美国总统乔-拜登准备对中国征收新一轮关税之际，一个美国大豆贸易组织正在推动对中国使用过的食用油征收更高的关税，该组织称中国的食用油正在削弱美国用于生物燃料的农作物。【原文：As President Joe Biden prepares a new wave of tariffs against China, a US soybean trade group is pushing for higher levies on Chinese used cooking oil that it says is undercutting American crops used for biofuels.】
